synonyms.synonym: Hyaluronan-binding protein 2 27 kDa light chain alternate form
Hyaluronan-binding protein 2 50 kDa heavy chain alternate form

protein.specific_function: Cleaves the alpha-chain at multiple sites and the beta- chain between 'Lys-53' and 'Lys-54' but not the gamma-chain of fibrinogen and therefore does not initiate the formation of the fibrin clot and does not cause the fibrinolysis directly. It does not cleave (activate) prothrombin and plasminogen but converts the inactive single chain urinary plasminogen activator (pro- urokinase) to the active two chain form. Activates coagulation factor VII

go_class.description: peptidase activity, acting on l-amino acid peptides

reference.reference_text: Choi-Miura NH, Tobe T, Sumiya J, Nakano Y, Sano Y, Mazda T, Tomita M: Purification and characterization of a novel hyaluronan-binding protein (PHBP) from human plasma: it has three EGF, a kringle and a serine protease domain, similar to hepatocyte growth factor activator. J Biochem. 1996 Jun;119(6):1157-65.
